description:
Yui finally goes to take her exam with the you good luck charm you gave her in hand. One day, while you two are walking down a path of cherry blossoms, Yui tells you a secret. This will probably be an unforgettable moment for the both of you. And then...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hanasaka Yui wa Te o Tsunagu
La main tendue de Yui Hanasaka
花坂結衣は手をつなぐ
